text: Need David Brown for Pillow Talk campaign. Budget around $20,788, looking for 2 x 3-minute vlog, 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x Twitter post, 1 x Pinterest pin, 2 x 2-minute tutorial. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 11 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
